languages.text: "Вислоухие клеппы проявляют высокую степень социализации как в группе сородичей, так и в отношении хозяина. Эти животные хорошо переносят низкую гравитацию на пустотном корабле, поскольку она сходна с условиями их родного мира. В случае необходимости мясо вислоухих клепп пригодно в пищу". {n}Голос звучит глухо, как через слой толстого стекла, но несомненно принадлежит женщине.{/n}

"Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. These animals adjust well to a voidship's lower gravity, since it is similar to their homeworld's conditions. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

В случае необходимости мясо вислоухих клепп пригодно в пищу". {n}Голос звучит глухо, как через слой толстого стекла, но несомненно принадлежит женщине.{/n}

languages.text: « Les kleppas aux oreilles tombantes sont des animaux très sociables, aussi bien avec leurs semblables qu'avec leurs maîtres. Ils s'adaptent sans problème à la gravité réduite d'un vaisseau, qui est semblable à celle de leur monde d'origine. De plus, en cas de nécessité, leur viande est comestible. » {n}La voix paraît étouffée, comme si vous l'entendiez à travers une vitre épaisse, mais il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle appartient à une femme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. These animals adjust well to a voidship's lower gravity, since it is similar to their homeworld's conditions. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

De plus, en cas de nécessité, leur viande est comestible. » {n}La voix paraît étouffée, comme si vous l'entendiez à travers une vitre épaisse, mais il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle appartient à une femme.{/n}

languages.text: «Los kleppas de orejas caídas exhiben un considerable grado de socialización entre los suyos y hacia sus amos. Esos animales se adaptan bien a la baja gravedad de las naves del vacío, ya que las condiciones son similares a las de su planeta natal. Y en caso de necesidad, la carne de kleppa de orejas caídas es comestible». {n}La voz suena apagada, como si hablase desde el otro lado de un grueso cristal, pero no cabe duda de que se trata de una mujer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. These animals adjust well to a voidship's lower gravity, since it is similar to their homeworld's conditions. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

Y en caso de necesidad, la carne de kleppa de orejas caídas es comestible.» {n}La voz suena apagada, como si hablase desde el otro lado de un grueso cristal, pero no cabe duda de que se trata de una mujer.{/n}

languages.text: “垂耳克莱珀在同类之间，以及与主人相处时，都会表现出高度的社会化特征。这种动物可以很好地适应虚空舰里较低的重力环境，因为这和它们的母星环境非常相似。在迫不得已的情况下，垂耳克莱珀的肉也可以当做食物来源。”{n}这个声音听起来很深沉，仿佛是从厚厚的玻璃后面传来的，但毫无疑问是女性的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロップイヤー・クレパスは、同種間でも飼い主に対しても高い社会性を示す。この動物はヴォイドシップの低い重力によく適応する。ヴォイドシップの重力は、彼らの世界に近いからだ。ロップイヤークレッパの肉は食用にもなる」 {n}分厚いガラスの向こうから聞こえてくるようなかすれた声だが、間違いなく女性の声だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. These animals adjust well to a voidship's lower gravity, since it is similar to their homeworld's conditions. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロップイヤー・クレパスは、同種間でも飼い主に対しても高い社会性を示す。この動物はヴォイドシップの低い重力によく適応する。ヴォイドシップの重力は、彼らの世界に近いからだ。ロップイヤークレッパの肉は食用にもなる」 {n}分厚いガラスの向こうから聞こえてくるようなかすれた声だが、間違いなく女性の声だ。{/n}

languages.text: "Hängeohr-Kleppas zeigen ein hohes Maß an Sozialisierung, sowohl untereinander als auch ihren Besitzern gegenüber. Diese Tiere passen sich gut an die niedrigere Schwerkraft auf einem Raumschiff an, da sie den Bedingungen auf ihrer Heimatwelt ähnelt. Das Fleisch von Hängeohr-Kleppas ist essbar, sofern dies nötig ist." {n}Die Stimme klingt gedämpft, als wäre sie hinter einer dicken Schicht Glas, aber es ist zweifellos eine Frauenstimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners. These animals adjust well to a voidship's lower gravity, since it is similar to their homeworld's conditions. Lop-eared kleppa meat is edible, should necessity demand it." {n}The voice sounds muffled, as though from behind a thick layer of glass, but is unmistakably a woman's.{/n}

languages.text: "Dal kulaklı kleppalar hem kendi türleri arasında hem de sahiplerine yönelik yüksek ölçüde sosyalleşme sergilemekte. Bu hayvanlar uçsuz gemisinin düşük yer çekimine, kendi yurtlarının koşullarına benzer olduğu için iyi uyum sağladılar. Sarkık kulaklı kleppa eti ihtiyaç olduğu takdirde yenilebilirdir." {n}Ses sanki kalın bir cam tabakasının arkasından gelir gibi boğuk ancak bir kadına ait olduğuna şüphe yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lop-eared kleppas display a high degree of socialisation both among their kind and toward their owners.
